review: As an owner of both an AppleTV and a Roku, I don't know why I bought the Fire TV Stick other than it was $20 for Prime customers. But I'm actually very happy that I did. It's a really solid little device, gives easy access to Prime videos and works incredibly well with the Amazon ecosystem. It's a great low cost streaming device, easy to use menus, and very intuitive. I have mine running through a 5 port HDMI switch with no noticeable issues.
